title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 19 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 19 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Fox’s Pete Hegseth joins Clay and Buck to discuss the unfolding disaster in Afghanistan. Raheem j. Kassam of The National Pulse calls in: Biden’s State Dept. halted a Trump-era "crisis response" plan aimed at avoiding Benghazi-style evacuations just months before Taliban takeover. Impeach "Joke" Biden. Biden leads from the basement. Afghan vets weigh in. How can we help our veterans during this difficult time?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
